name: agent-memory
description: MCP server providing structured memory backend for AI agents

scripts.db:backup: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='data/memory.db';const dest='data/backup-'+Date.now()+'.db';if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.copyFileSync(src,dest);console.log('Backup created:',dest)}else{console.error('No database found')}"
scripts.db:restore: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const args=process.argv.slice(2);if(!args[0]){console.error('Usage: npm run db:restore <backup-file>');process.exit(1)}if(fs.existsSync(args[0])){fs.copyFileSync(args[0],'data/memory.db');console.log('Database restored from',args[0])}else{console.error('Backup file not found:',args[0])}"
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run typecheck && npm run test:run
scripts.ci:test: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run typecheck && npm run test:run
